analysis.statement: Ensure all employees receive security awareness training

checks.description: Verify Azure AD user training completion tracking
checks.request: az ad user list --query '[].{UserPrincipalName:userPrincipalName, ComplianceExpirationDateTime:complianceExpirationDateTime, LastSignInDateTime:lastSignInDateTime}' --output json

checks.description: Verify security training conditional access policies
checks.request: az ad policy list --query '[?contains(definition.displayName, `Training`) || contains(definition.displayName, `Compliance`)].{Name:definition.displayName, State:definition.state}' --output json

checks.description: Verify training completion monitoring and reporting
checks.response: Documentation review required to verify training completion monitoring, reporting procedures, and remediation for non-compliant users

checks.description: Verify security awareness training program governance
checks.response: Documentation review required to verify security awareness training program governance, content updates, and effectiveness measurement
